ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Jasper Tool
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: Creates a process definition for Jasper reports in the Etendo Application Dictionary.

ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Organization Initial Setup Tool
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: A tool that initializes/creates a new organization in Etendo.

ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Client Initial Setup
ETCOP_TOOL.DESCRIPTION: A tool to initialize a client in the Etendo system.

ETCOP_TOOL.NAME: Test Run Tool
